TopicTitle: Weird fairing bug - 1.25 meter fairing dissapears after changing music volume

Articles.Content: With latest version, I have a ship with a 1.25 fairing closed on top, I went to launch pad, and before launch opened the settings menu with esc, adjusted the music volume and returned to the game, and the fairing had dissapeared. I tried again and it is 100% repeatable. The fairing wont dissapear just through entering the settings menu, it *only happens after changing the music volume*. I'm sorry if this sounds like the ramblings of a mad man but it is repeatable. Any ideas?

Try clicking apply in the settings menu. That does it too. 

 I need to submit a bug report.
Doesn't happen on Linux, can you provide more information on this such as your logs and system specs please.

I had this kind of issue with an interstage fairing disappearing in the VAB when rearranging staging (or something else, I don't remember but I know it had nothing to do with the options).

I also experienced fairing disappearing in flight when quickloading.

Maybe all these issues are linked ?
